events.title: AI & Machine Learning Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop covering neural networks, deep learning frameworks, and practical AI applications.

events.title: Quantum Computing Seminar
events.description: Introduction to quantum mechanics principles and quantum computing applications in technology.

events.title: Space Tech Innovation Challenge
events.description: 24-hour hackathon focused on developing solutions for space exploration and satellite technology.

events.title: Robotics & Automation Expo
events.description: Showcase of latest robotics projects and autonomous systems by club members and guest speakers.

events.title: Blockchain & Cryptocurrency Discussion
events.description: Panel discussion on blockchain technology, DeFi, and the future of digital currencies.

events.title: Virtual Reality Development Workshop
events.description: Learn VR development using Unity and create your first immersive experience.

events.title: Cybersecurity & Ethical Hacking
events.description: Introduction to cybersecurity principles and ethical hacking techniques for defense.

events.title: IoT Smart Home Project
events.description: Build and program IoT devices for smart home automation using Arduino and sensors.

events.title: Tech Startup Pitch Competition
events.description: Students pitched innovative tech startup ideas to a panel of industry experts and investors.

events.title: 3D Printing & Design Workshop
events.description: Learn 3D modeling, printing techniques, and create custom prototypes for your projects.
